snippet: The president’s place in history looks considerably different than a week ago. Can the transformation he envisioned survive his administration?...
abstract: Donald Trump's victory in 2016 presidential election threatens Pres Obama's progressive and inclusive vision of America, as well as specific initiatives on health care and climate change; critics are at odds over whether outcome amounts to rejection of what Obama stands for, or simply changing course typical of American political process.
lead_paragraph: The president’s place in history looks considerably different than a week ago. Can the transformation he envisioned survive his administration?

headline.main: Obama’s Policies and Broader Vision Face Reckoning With History
headline.print_headline: Trump’s Ascendance Upends Obama’s Vision for America

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
